scripts.go: pnpm install ; pnpm run build:test ; pnpm run start
scripts.start: pnpm run clearup-serve && python3 -m http.server 3000 --directory out
scripts.cicd: pnpm run build  && mkdir -p out1 && cp -rT out out1 && pnpm run clean
scripts.build: pnpm run clearup-serve && pnpm run korpora && pnpm run build-core && pnpm run print && touch out/.nojekyll && ([ -d /app/service/DNS ] && cp -avr /app/service/DNS/* out/ || [ -d ../data/DNS ] && cp -avr ../data/DNS/* out/ || true) && ([ -d /vreji ] && cp -avr /vreji out/ || [ -d ../data/.cache ] && cp -avr ../data/.cache out/vreji || true) && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.build:test: pnpm run clearup-serve && next build --webpack && touch out/.nojekyll && ([ -d /app/service/DNS ] && cp -avr /app/service/DNS/* out/ || [ -d ../data/DNS ] && cp -avr ../data/DNS/* out/ || true) && ([ -d /vreji ] && cp -avr /vreji out/ || [ -d ../data/.cache ] && cp -avr ../data/.cache out/vreji || true) && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.korpora: rm -rf /tmp/korpora && mkdir -p /tmp/korpora && rm -rf md_pages/texts && mkdir -p md_pages/texts && node lib/korpora/index.js
scripts.print: mkdir -p ${VREJI_DIR:-../data/.cache}/uencu && pnpm run start & sleep 5 && VREJI_DIR=${VREJI_DIR:-../data/.cache} node lib/printer && VREJI_DIR=${VREJI_DIR:-../data/.cache} ./lib/printer/shrink-pdf.sh && pnpm run clearup-serve
scripts.clearup-serve: lsof -t -i:3000 | xargs --no-run-if-empty kill -9 && next telemetry disable
